title: Res-MGCA-SE: a lightweight convolutional neural network based on vision transformer for medical image classification

abstract: This paper presents a lightweight and accurate convolution neural network (CNN) based on encoder in vision transformer structure, which uses multigroup convolution rather than multilayer perceptron and multiheaded self-attention. We propose a …
